long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy any recipe from any website with just one click. Recipe manager, shopping list, and meal planner.

Manage all your recipes in one location. Edit copied recipes or add your own. Organize with collections. Add recipes to your shopping list and cross items off when you're in the supermarket. Plan meals with the meal planner. Share your recipes and get inspired by others.
